pesuacademy.exceptions package

Submodules

pesuacademy.exceptions.authentication module

This module defines custom exceptions related to authentication errors in the PESU Academy application.

pesuacademy.exceptions.csrf module

This module defines a custom exception for CSRF token errors in the PESU Academy application.
